content: Stream created by Daniel Geisler.
Christian Williams renamed stream combinatorics to theory: combinatorics.
Nathanael Arkor changed the access permissions for this stream from Public to Web-public.

Matteo Capucci (he/him) changed the description for this stream.

  • Old description:

Combinatorial applications of category theory (analytic combinatorics)

  • New description:

Deprecated, use #theory: mathematics instead. Combinatorial applications of category theory (analytic combinatorics)
Matteo Capucci (he/him) renamed stream theory: combinatorics to deprecated: combinatorics.
